actions.committee: House Committee on Interior and Insular Affairs
actions.text: Referred to House Committee on Interior and Insular Affairs.

official_title: A bill to authorize the acquisition and maintenance of the Goddard Rocket Launching Site in accordance with the act of August 25, 1961, as amended and supplemented, and for other purposes.

summary.text: Authorizes the Secretary of the Interior to provide for the acquisition and maintenance of the Goddard Rocket Launching Site in Auburn, Massachusetts. Authorizes necessary appropriations to carry out this Act.

titles.title: A bill to authorize the acquisition and maintenance of the Goddard Rocket Launching Site in accordance with the act of August 25, 1961, as amended and supplemented, and for other purposes.
